resources.string:
Getting your Muki ID

 Pour something hot (for example water) to your Muki. Open Bluetooth settings on your phone and look for a device named "PAULIG_MUKI_XXXXXX". The XXXXXX part is your Muki ID, fill it to the text box in app (and click save if you want the app to remember it).


"Get info" button

 This action will try to connect to specified Muki and if successful, shows some technical data below the button.


Choosing the color mode

 The app offers 2 alternative ways of converting the image. "Color" mode generally yields betters results for colored images and "BW" mode (Color off) for monochrome images like symbols. Feel free to experiment, the change will be reflected next time you pick a new image.


Picking the image

 You can pick the image with "Pick image" button. After selecting image you can crop it if you wish. If the preview looks good, you can send the image to Muki by pressing "Send".
